history.content: I think it's fine. You are required to have two technicals counting toward your major and at least 12 units total per semester, and the 1/3 PNP unit only applies when you are graduating.

Besides the overall 1/3rd P/NP unit cap, is there a cap on the number of units that can be obtained from decals in a semester? I was planning on taking 8 units' worth of technical courses and 2 decals worth 2 units each, for a total of 12 units (CoE minimum unit requirement), but wasn't sure if this was allowed.
history.subject: Decal Unit Cap?
